svg.text: Frontend: React 18+, Next.js 14+, TipTap, Konva.js, TailwindCSS
AI/ML: Claude API, DeepSeek R1, Qwen 3, Yi 1.5
Infrastructure: GCP (GKE, Cloud SQL, Cloud Storage)
✓ Master Data Management (Single source of truth)

text.style: font-family: Inter, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-style: italic; fill: #1E293B

svg.text: Built for 2025 | POD-Based Development | 22-25 Story Points per Sprint
